ygData.subject: RE: Song Taunting.
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh heh definitely, but in this case the Selo s didn t actually effect anyone but me, I was ungrouped in N Karana.  The guards were probably all in the radius
ygData.messageBody:
Heh heh definitely, but in this case the Selo's didn't actually effect
anyone but me, I was ungrouped in N Karana. The guards were probably all in
the radius though.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
Sent: Wednesday, December 15, 1999 12:59 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Song Taunting.


From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>

> aggressor and as soon as my song pulsed, the guards uttered that horrid
> statement about 'bards like you'. I fled instantly, but since I knew
> neither I nor my groupmate who wasn't even in the zone, had attacked the
> guards I feel sure some bug occurred. I /bugged it at the time. Has
anyone
> else had similar things happen to them when their song radius might have
> included someone but did not actually affect them?

Yes, absolutely.

Never Selo's an invisible Dark Elf past the Halas Guards. heheheh =)

My song pulse (despite the fact that the DE was invis) still
really pisses off those guards and they are really good at chasing
you.

Harmonic.

Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
